Uses of Package
games

  • Packages that use games 
    Package Description
    games
    Implements all the logic for the games
    gui
    Implements the user interface
  • Classes in games used by games 
    Class and Description
    Checkers2.CheckerCell 
    Game
    Games superclass
  • Classes in games used by gui 
    Class and Description
    Checkers2
    This class implements the game Checkers (also known as Draughts).
    GameOfLife
    Implements Conway's "Game of Life" for use with the launchpad S
    LightsOut
    Implements Lights Out game
    ReactionGame
    Implements Reaction timing game - Whack a mole-like game
    Simon
    This class will implement the well know Simon game.
    Snake
    Implements Snake game
